pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, February 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, February 28, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the national caucus meeting.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with The Afghan Dreamers team.

Library of Parliament

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:10 p.m.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.
